title._content: Not All Businessmen Agreed with the Oregon Governor's Executive Order Curtailing Neon and Commercial Lighting. This Neon Light Company Referred to the Bible Passage Which Reads "Let There Be Light," at Portland 10/1973

description._content: Original Caption: Not All Businessmen Agreed with the Oregon Governor's Executive Order Curtailing Neon and Commercial Lighting.
